<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205306</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reporting the Truth from Baghdad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berichten über die Wahrheit von Baghdad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enregistrement de la vérité de Bagdad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relatando a verdade de Bagdade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnalazione della verità da Bagdad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποβολή εκθέσεων της αλήθειας από τη Βαγδάτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señalar la verdad de Bagdad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will understand the major turning points in the history of Iraq, explore the ideas of freedom of the press and responsibilities of reporters, and examine various news reports through a critical lens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer verstehen die Hauptdrehpunkte in 
der Geschichte vom Irak, erforschen die Ideen der Freiheit der Presse 
und der Verantwortlichkeiten von Reportern und überprüfen 
verschiedene Nachrichtenreporte durch ein kritisches Objektiv.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants comprendront les tournants 
principaux dans l'histoire de l'Irak, exploreront les idées de la 
liberté de la presse et des responsabilités des journalistes, et 
examineront de divers états de nouvelles par un objectif critique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes compreenderão os pontos de giro 
principais no history de Iraq, explorarão as idéias da liberdade da 
imprensa e das responsabilidades dos repórteres, e examinarão 
vários relatórios de notícia através de uma lente crítica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi capiranno le svolte principali nella 
storia di Irak, esploreranno le idee della libertà della pressa
e delle responsabilità dei reporter ed esamineranno i vari 
rapporti di notizie tramite un obiettivo critico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα καταλάβουν τις σημαντικότερες 
κρίσιμες καμπές στην ιστορία του Ιράκ, θα ερευνήσουν τις ιδέες 
της ελευθερίας του Τύπου και των ευθυνών των δημοσιογράφων, και θα
εξετάσουν τις διάφορες εκθέσεις ειδήσεων μέσω ενός κρίσιμου 
φακού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes entenderán los momentos cruciales
principales en la historia de Iraq, explorarán las ideas de la 
libertad de la prensa y de las responsabilidades de reporteros, y 
examinarán varios informes de noticias a través de una lente 
crítica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
